column4: I type in terminal sudo apt-get install build-essential libgtkmm-2.4-dev autogen automake libtool intltool libglademm-2.4-dev
dpkg: parse error, in file `/var/lib/dpkg/status' near line 30728 package `xrgb':
Configured-Version for package with inappropriate Status
E: Sub-process /usr/bin/dpkg returned an error code (2)
